title: Software Developer at Encora Inc
description: Working at internal projects for Data and GenAI as accelerators and improving processes for Talent Acquisition (Android and Java/Kotlin Backend).

title: Client Director and Engineering Manager at Encora Inc
description: I coached and managed 56 engineers across the USA, Mexico, Argentina, Costa Rica, Colombia, and India while overseeing 17 client accounts in industries such as logistics, travel, healthcare, education, and energy. My role included facilitating kickoff meetings, defining expectations, and drafting contracts (SOW, MSA, EAF), as well as implementing performance improvement programs, onboarding/offboarding processes, and regular team health checks. I conducted weekly and biweekly meetings, one-on-one sessions for workload and wellbeing, performance and salary reviews, and ensured financial health within accounts. Additionally, I supported talent delivery, assigned roles, coordinated travel, presented Encora’s capabilities in Gen AI, Cloud, and Data, created fiscal reports and industry updates, interviewed candidates, designed challenges for the Spark Internship Program, mentored developers on the bench, and managed internal products and accelerators.

title: Android Developer at Crew App
description: I designed and executed strategies to modernize legacy code by migrating from Java to Kotlin, while creating proof-of-concepts with Coroutines to enable new implementations. My work focused on continuous performance improvements, defining and documenting best practices and coding standards, and delivering demos of new features. Additionally, I established clear technical documentation in Confluence to support knowledge sharing and team alignment.

title: Android Developer at Harvestmark
description: Industry: Food and Transportation. Created and implemented a strategy to update all the legacy code from Eclipse version to Android Studio, Java to Kotlin and AsyncTasks to RxJava. Also created a version for China Territory

title: Lead Developer at Movistar
